headline: Chubb (CB): Assessing Valuation After Strong Q3 Earnings and Increased Share Buybacks
summary: Chubb reported strong third-quarter earnings, driven by record core operating income from both underwriting and investment activities. The company also signaled confidence with a fresh round of share buybacks and broad-based premium growth. See our latest analysis for Chubb. Chubb’s last twelve months have seen some big moves, from record-setting third-quarter earnings and major product launches to a leadership shakeup and a new share buyback. The share price currently sits at $269.26, and...
